snippet: A rebound in oil prices also advanced energy stocks and helped move shares past a January slump.
abstract: Rising oil prices help stocks climb, pushing market to new closing high.
lead_paragraph: A rebound in oil prices also advanced energy stocks and helped move shares past a January slump.

headline.main: Report of Growth in Europe Helps Nudge the S.&P. 500 to a New High
headline.print_headline: Report of Growth in Europe Helps Nudge the S.&P. 500 to a New High
